posts.post_content:
Inspired by the successful T206 trading post.  Let's start an 05.  Feel free to post your own trade deals here.  Here is my trade bait:  Graded: Willett psa 2, Rowan Psa 2, upper corner crack.  Raw: Knight fair, Brown : poor nice front paper loss back, Kroh fair, Overall fair pinhole, Ferguson Poor, Barger Partial var poor tear upper right.


Needs:  any 1 Green american beauty f/g, Harry Lord fair or better, Daubert Fair or better, Chase side View, Bresnahan mouth open, Dahlen, shean cubs var any weird/freak cards.  Willing to throw money into the deal if need be.  


Let's show the "Monster" guys that 05 guys can trade too!  PM with offers.

Brown has been traded.  Booya

I am looking for some PD 42's. I have a PD 42 Camnitz PSA 4 and a PD 42 Murray PSA 1.5. to trade I will post pics later this evening. 

PM what you have and we'll make a trade if possible.

Thanks,
Adam

posts.post_title: Time to rejuvenate this old thread--
posts.post_content:
It's closing in on a year, so I'm bumping with these [some old, some new], pictured below.

Trade-wise, I prefer ungraded cards [though I don't rule out graded ones].  I am always looking to upgrade my collection/replace slabbed cards.

Please email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] if interested.  No pm's, please; my pm box is often full.

I also have the following graded cards to trade:

Adkins/ML,      Hassan,       SGC 20,
Bergen,            Sovereign,   SGC 40,
Birmingham,    Polar Bear,  SGC 40,
Corridon,          Sovereign,   SGC 40,
Devore,            Sweet Cap   SGC 10,
Egan,      Honest Long Cut   SGC 20
Elberfeld,                             PSA 2
Foxen,              Piedmont,    SGC 40,
Gardner,          Piedmont,    SGC 30,
Gaspar,            Piedmont,    SGC 40,
Latham, A. on back, Pied.,  SGC 30,
Lobert,   American Beauty  SGC 30
Lush,                 Sweet Cap  SGC 40,
Leach,              Piedmont,   SGC 40,
Mattern,          Piedmont,    SGC 30,
Scott,                Sweet Cap  SGC 30,
Sweeney, SP,   Polar Bear,  SGC 10,
Wiltse, both ears, Cycle,    SGC 30,
WALLACE with cap, Pied.   PSA 1.5

A note on the scans: As the page turns, the backs are in reverse order.

Hello all ...I just thought I would try and revive this thread after I happen to see a similar thread for t206 ...Anyway I have been putting together a raw set and braking out 2, 3, and 4's. I don't mind a minor crease but want centered. If there is enough interest it could be fun for a lot of us. Most of us have doubles or even triples. We should post our needs or PM me if you would like.

I'm looking for a low condition Kroh and Schulte if anyone can help
[url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]

This is a hybrid post of sorts, but in an effort to get closer to completion on my T205 set, I'm offering up some of my T206 duplicates. Cannot scan all of these right now but almost all are lower-grade (think PSA A to PSA 1.5).

I have about 110 to trade. Most are Piedmont and Sweet Caporal but some are Polar Bear and Old Mill. The majority are commons, but I have some HOFs and SLs, including:

Bender Trees
Bernard SL
Chase Dark Cap
Chase Blue Portrait
Chase Trophy
Dahlen Boston
Dahlen Brooklyn
Elberfeld Washington
Griffith Bat
Guiheen SL
Hart SL
Lipe SL
Seitz SL (better condition - probably a PSA 2/2.5)
Smith SL
Stark SL
White SL

I am looking for the following T205s (preferably in lower-grade or beater condition but would consider mid-grade). 

Adkins, Ames, Archer, Baker, Barger Partial B, Bender, Bresnahan Mouth Open, Cady, Carrigan, Cicotte, Dahlen, Daubert, Donohue, Dougherty Red Sock, Dunn, Fisher, Ford (both white and black cap), Gaspar, Graham Cubs, Grant, Gray Stats, Harmon One Ear, Huggins, WaJo, Karger, Kleinow, Krause, Latham, A.P. Leifeld, McAllister, Raymond, Shean (Cubs), Suggs, Sweeney, Turner, Vaughn, Wagner, Wallace no cap (both one 1910 line or two), Walsh, Wiltse One Ear.

Can/Will provide scans to any interested parties. Again, most of these duplicates are low-grade and replaced in my set by better cards or cards with tougher backs.

Not interested in selling any of these - only trading.

I've got the following for trade. Looking for low grade commons in return (I need about 35-40 more, so not worth listing them all here). The Wiltse is skinned pretty thin, while the Merkle appears to be torn in half.
